hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below its 100-day rolling 20th percentile (compression) AND the 5-day average daily range is below 2.5%, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-day average signals transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 85% probability of 5%+ continuation within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended volatility compression often precedes significant directional moves. Breakouts from tight ranges with confirming volume suggest institutional accumulation and regime change initiation rather than false breakout.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day realized volatility < 20th percentile of 100-day rolling window
BTC closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std dev)

exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of signals result in immediate reversal below Bollinger mid-band within 2 days, or less than 60% achieve 3%+ gains within 5 days across 100+ historical instances.
